name: vDSP.FFT
desc: A 1D single- and double-precision fast Fourier transform.

items.name: init?(log2n: vDSP_Length, radix: vDSP.Radix, ofType: T.Type)
items.desc: Initializes a new fast Fourier transform instance.

items.name: func forward(input: DSPSplitComplex, output: inout DSPSplitComplex)
items.desc: Computes an out-of-place forward fast Fourier transform.

items.name: func inverse(input: DSPSplitComplex, output: inout DSPSplitComplex)
items.desc: Computes an out-of-place inverse fast Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<T>(input: T, output: inout T, direction: vDSP.FourierTransformDirection)
items.desc: Computes an out-of-place fast Fourier transform.
